data.title: La Folie du Docteur Tube
data.meta_description: La Folie du docteur Tube is a 1915 short silent experimental film directed by Abel Gance, in which a scientist takes a white powder, and then hallucinates. Gance shows the man's hallucinations by using a series of distorting lenses on the camera. A print of the film survives. Albert Dieudonn as Dr.
